note: Don't be a bystander. Take action to see change. Ignorance breeds from lack of education and never leaving the place you were born. Explore further and slowly you will start to diversity, keep going and you will feel your mind start to open. Embrace it, because knowledge is the key to unlock the ignorance and open up a whole new world where the color of our skin or who we decide to love is not an issue. Equality. Peace. Love. Freedom. ‚úåÔ∏è & üññ

name: Science Truth Future Space
value: Ignorance is not bliss, it is because you can only see one side of something from being sheltered. Open your mind and go out into the real world to find clarity. See things from all sides and the inside..
